title: The Secret Sky
description: Fatima is a Hazara girl. She was raised to be obedient, to be dutiful, and to honour the traditions of her family, her village, and her religion. Samiullah is a Pashtun boy. He was raised to be a landowner, to increase his family's power, and to defend the traditions of his tribe, his village, and his religion. They were not meant to fall in love. But they do.
author: Atia Abawi
